segments.text: Hi , I need to talk with the property manager right away !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is the property manager . What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This morning , when we woke up , there was water pouring in from the ceiling !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me what room had the leak ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There were several rooms , but the worst leak was in the bathroom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you please remind me which floor you are on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are on the second floor , one of the middle floors .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will be sending the assistant manager to check it out . May we look at it this morning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I have to go to school right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you aren â€™ t there , we will use our master key to get in and check things out .
segments.speaker: S2
